org.finra.herd.service

Interface EmrHelperService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmrHelperServiceImpl

    public interface EmrHelperService
    The helper service class for the emr functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • emrPreCreateClusterSteps

        EmrClusterPreCreateDto emrPreCreateClusterSteps(EmrClusterAlternateKeyDto emrClusterAlternateKeyDto,
                                                EmrClusterCreateRequest request)
                                         throws Exception
        Executes steps required to prepare for the EMR cluster creation.
        Parameters:
        emrClusterAlternateKeyDto - the ERM cluster alternate key
        request - The EMR cluster create request
        Returns:
        the EMR cluster pre-create DTO with cluster definition and AWS related parameters
        Throws:
        Exception - Exception when the original EMR cluster definition XML is malformed

      • emrCreateClusterAwsSpecificSteps

        EmrClusterCreateDto emrCreateClusterAwsSpecificSteps(EmrClusterCreateRequest request,
                                                     EmrClusterDefinition emrClusterDefinition,
                                                     EmrClusterAlternateKeyDto emrClusterAlternateKeyDto,
                                                     EmrParamsDto emrParamsDto)
        Executes S3 specific steps for EMR cluster creation.
        Parameters:
        request - The EMR cluster create request
        emrClusterDefinition - the EMR cluster definition
        emrClusterAlternateKeyDto - the ERM cluster alternate key
        emrParamsDto - the AWS related parameters
        Returns:
        an EMR cluster create DTO with the cluster creation information

      • logEmrClusterCreation

        void logEmrClusterCreation(EmrClusterAlternateKeyDto emrClusterAlternateKeyDto,
                           EmrClusterDefinition emrClusterDefinition,
                           String clusterId)
                    throws Exception
        Logs the EMR cluster creation event.
        Parameters:
        emrClusterAlternateKeyDto - the ERM cluster alternate key
        emrClusterDefinition - the EMR cluster definition
        clusterId - the EMR cluster Id
        Throws:
        Exception - Exception can occur when converting the EMR cluster definition to XML
